/usr/lib/nvidia-cuda-toolkit/bin/g++ -pthread CMakeFiles/oddeven.dir/oddeven.cu.o -o oddeven  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib /usr/local/lib/libcaliper.so.2.11.0-dev /home/aurkorouth/Adiak/build/lib/libadiak.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/stubs" -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu"
